title: Infinite scroll and template shell
body: A nice Idea will be, at least as developer, to have an infinite scroll that could help a lot when you are reading a log from an application.

comments.body: For clarification on what he meant by OMZsh templates, see http://zshthem.es/all/
The infinite scroll idea is a good one and it's on our backlog. To hide the fact that I am not sure what you are asking (oops), I'll let Paul or Michael jump on this one! --Rich
